ragEngine.title: Semantic Intelligence Engine

step1.title: Smart Indexing
step1.description: Documents are automatically chunked and converted to vector embeddings for semantic understanding.

step2.title: Context Retrieval
step2.description: When you ask a question, AI finds the most relevant context from all your projects and conversations.

step3.title: Intelligent Response
step3.description: GPT synthesizes an answer using retrieved context, citing sources so you can verify every claim.

documents.title: Your Documents, Instantly Searchable
documents.subtitle: Upload your files and ask questions in natural language. AI automatically analyzes, chunks, and indexes your content for intelligent retrieval.

upload.description: Simply drag files from your computer or click to upload. Support for PDF, Word, Excel, and text files.

chunk.title: Auto Chunking
chunk.description: Documents are automatically split into optimal chunks for AI comprehension. No manual preprocessing required.

search.title: Semantic Search
search.description: Ask questions in natural language and get precise answers with source citations from your documents.

step2.title: Upload Documents
step2.description: Drag and drop your files. AI automatically processes and indexes them for intelligent search.

step3.title: Ask Anything
step3.description: Chat naturally and get answers from your documents. AI cites sources so you can verify every response.

hero.title: The AI Assistant That Remembers Everything
hero.subtitle: Structure knowledge by project. Build context over time. Get intelligent answers from your entire conversation history with powerful semantic search.

hero.demoAnswer: Based on your previous conversations about vector databases and semantic search...

features.title: Built for Knowledge Work, Not Just Chatting
features.subtitle: Transform scattered conversations into structured knowledge that grows more valuable over time

explorer.title: Project-Based Organization
explorer.description: Structure conversations like files in folders. Keep client work separate from personal research. Navigate your knowledge base with Windows Explorer familiarity.

rag.title: Context-Aware AI
rag.description: Every answer draws from your entire conversation history. AI automatically finds relevant discussions from weeks or months ago across all projects.

search.title: Intelligent Memory Recall
search.description: Search by meaning, not just keywords. Find that discussion about 'authentication' even when you talked about 'login flows' and 'user sessions'.

streaming.title: Real-time Responses
streaming.description: See AI thinking in real-time with WebSocket streaming. Start reading answers as they're generated, no waiting for completion.

security.title: Secure & Private
security.description: Your conversations stay yours. Complete data isolation with secure authentication. PostgreSQL reliability, cloud convenience.

multimodal.title: More Than Text
multimodal.description: Upload images, diagrams, and screenshots. Get AI insights on visual content alongside your text discussions.

multilingual.title: Multilingual Support
multilingual.description: Full interface support for English and Korean. Chat in your preferred language with localized UI and responses.

dragdrop.title: Intuitive File Management
dragdrop.description: Drag and drop files and folders like Windows Explorer. Hierarchical organization with unlimited subfolders.

knowledge.benefit1: Organize research by topic or project
knowledge.benefit2: AI connects insights across papers and notes
knowledge.benefit3: Instant recall of concepts you studied weeks ago

development.title: Business & Consulting

development.benefit3: Build expertise that compounds over time

dataSecurity.title: Your Data, Your Control
dataSecurity.subtitle: Enterprise-grade security with full transparency on how your data is handled.

encryption.title: End-to-End Encryption
encryption.description: All data encrypted at rest and in transit. Your conversations and documents are protected with industry-standard encryption.

retention.title: Clear Retention Policies
retention.description: Know exactly how long your data is kept. 7-day warning before archival with easy restore options during grace period.

isolation.title: Complete Data Isolation
isolation.description: Each user's data is completely separated. No cross-contamination, no shared access, no compromises on privacy.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about WiseQuery

q1.question: What are the limitations of the free plan?
q1.answer: The free plan includes 3 projects, 30 conversations, and 10GB storage with 30-day data retention. You get full access to basic RAG search and all core features. Perfect for personal use and trying out the platform.

q2.question: What file formats are supported?
q2.answer: WiseQuery supports PDF, Word documents (.docx), Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx), CSV files, and plain text (.txt). All files are automatically parsed, chunked, and indexed for AI-powered search.

q3.question: How long is my data retained?
q3.answer: Data retention depends on your plan: Free (30 days), Basic (180 days), Pro (1 year), Custom (unlimited). You'll receive email notifications 7 days before data archival, and archived data can be restored within a grace period.

q4.question: Can I share projects with others?
q4.answer: Currently, WiseQuery is designed for individual use with complete data isolation for security. Team collaboration features are on our roadmap for future releases.

q5.question: Can I export my data?
q5.answer: Yes! You can export your conversations as JSON or text files at any time. Your data belongs to you, and we make it easy to take it with you.

finalCta.title: Ready to Build Knowledge That Lasts?
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of professionals who trust WiseQuery to organize, search, and leverage their knowledge.

footer.tagline: The AI assistant that remembers everything. Build knowledge that compounds over time.

changelog.title: Changelog
changelog.subtitle: Stay updated with the latest features, improvements, and fixes

chatGptMarkdown.title: ChatGPT-Style Markdown Rendering
chatGptMarkdown.description: Enhanced AI response formatting with ChatGPT-style markdown rendering. Features include styled headings with icons, colored list markers (bullets and numbers), inline code highlighting, blockquotes, tables, and emoji-to-icon conversion. Supports both light and dark themes.

aiLatencyOptimization.title: AI Response Latency Optimization
aiLatencyOptimization.description: Reduced AI response latency by 70-80% through background embedding generation, parallel RAG search with OpenAI streaming, and N+1 query elimination. Time-to-first-token reduced to 0.5-1 second for faster conversations.

passwordReset.title: Password Reset Functionality
passwordReset.description: Added complete password reset flow for email/password users. Users can request a reset code via email, enter the code, and set a new password. Includes email validation and translated error messages.

autoRagPipeline.title: Automatic RAG Pipeline
autoRagPipeline.description: Implemented automatic document processing pipeline. Files are now automatically parsed, chunked, and embedded upon upload. Supports PDF, Word, Excel, and text files with intelligent chunking and OpenAI Vector Store compatible attribute filtering.

propertiesDialog.title: File & Folder Properties Dialog
propertiesDialog.description: Added properties context menu for all files and folders. View detailed information including type, location, size, content count, and creation date in a Windows Explorer-style properties dialog.

dataRetention.title: Tier-Based Data Retention System
dataRetention.description: Implemented comprehensive data expiration and retention policies. Features graduated retention periods by subscription tier (Free: 30/60 days, Basic: 180 days, Pro: 365 days, Enterprise: unlimited), warning notifications before archival, and restore functionality.

multiFileSelect.title: Multi-File Selection & Operations
multiFileSelect.description: Added drag-to-select functionality in file viewer for selecting multiple files and folders. Selected items support cut, copy, paste operations across projects with full context menu integration.

folderContextMenu.title: Enhanced Folder Context Menu
folderContextMenu.description: Extended context menu support for folders including rename, properties, cut, copy, and delete operations. Folders are now included in drag selection and support all file operations.

languageToggleFix.title: Language Toggle Button Fix
languageToggleFix.description: Fixed an issue where the language selection button in the navigation bar had incorrect text width, causing display problems. Button now properly shows icon and text.

customAuth.title: Custom Authentication System
customAuth.description: Introduced comprehensive custom authentication with email/password signup, OAuth integration (Google, Kakao, Naver), email verification via SendGrid, and password reset functionality.

ragEnhancement.title: Enhanced RAG System
ragEnhancement.description: Improved cross-project context retrieval with relaxed similarity thresholds and expanded context windows for more relevant AI responses.

streamingFix.title: WebSocket Streaming Stability
streamingFix.description: Fixed intermittent connection drops during AI response streaming. Implemented exponential backoff reconnection strategy.

imageUpload.title: Image Upload Support
imageUpload.description: Added ability to upload and attach images to conversations. AI can now analyze visual content alongside text discussions.

securityUpdate.title: Security Enhancements
securityUpdate.description: Upgraded session management with improved cookie security and added CSRF protection for all API endpoints.

i18nSupport.title: Multilingual Support
i18nSupport.description: Full internationalization with English and Korean language support. All UI components, dialogs, and error messages are now fully translated.

stripeIntegration.title: Stripe Payment Integration
stripeIntegration.description: Integrated Stripe for subscription management with Free, Pro, and Team plans. Includes customer portal for self-service subscription management.

initialRelease.title: Initial Release
initialRelease.description: Launched AI Chat Explorer with project-based conversation organization, RAG-powered semantic search, and Windows Explorer-style interface.

about.title: About WiseQuery
about.subtitle: We're building the AI assistant that truly remembers and understands your work

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: WiseQuery was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to create an AI assistant that doesn't just respond to queries, but truly understands and remembers the context of your work.
story.paragraph2: We noticed that despite the advances in AI technology, most tools still treated each conversation as isolated. Knowledge from past discussions was lost, and users found themselves repeatedly explaining context. We knew there had to be a better way.
story.paragraph3: Today, WiseQuery's RAG-powered platform helps thousands of professionals organize their knowledge, maintain context across projects, and work more efficiently with AI that actually remembers.

mission.title: Mission-Driven
mission.description: We're committed to democratizing AI-powered knowledge management for everyone.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At WiseQuery, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered knowledge management platform.
privacy.questions: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us.

collection.title: Information We Collect
collection.content:
We collect information you provide directly to us, including:

• Account Information: When you create an account, we collect your name, email address, and password. If you sign up using OAuth providers (Google, Kakao, Naver), we receive your basic profile information from those services.

• Content Data: We store the conversations, projects, and messages you create within our platform to provide our services.

• Usage Information: We automatically collect information about how you interact with our services, including access times, pages viewed, and features used.

• Device Information: We collect information about the device you use to access our services, including device type, operating system, and browser type.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.content:
We use the information we collect to:

• Provide, maintain, and improve our services
• Process transactions and send related information
• Send technical notices, updates, and support messages
• Respond to your comments, questions, and requests
• Generate embeddings for semantic search functionality
• Analyze usage patterns to improve user experience
• Detect, investigate, and prevent fraudulent or unauthorized activities

storage.title: Data Storage and Retention
storage.content:
Your data is stored on secure servers provided by our infrastructure partners. We retain your personal information for as long as your account is active or as needed to provide you services. You may request deletion of your account and associated data at any time by contacting us.

Conversation data and embeddings are stored to enable our RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) features. When you delete a conversation, the associated embeddings are also removed.

retention.title: Data Expiration & Retention Policies
retention.content:
To maintain optimal service performance and manage storage efficiently, we implement tier-based data retention policies:

• Free Plan: Conversations are retained for 30 days and files for 60 days from last activity.

• Basic Plan: All data is retained for 180 days from last activity.

• Pro Plan: All data is retained for 365 days (1 year) from last activity.

• Custom/Enterprise Plan: Unlimited retention with no automatic expiration.

Before data expires, you will receive an email notification 7 days in advance. Expired data is first archived for a 14-day grace period, during which you can restore it. After the grace period, archived data is permanently deleted.

You can view and restore archived items in your account settings before permanent deletion. Upgrading your plan immediately extends your retention period.

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content:
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

• With your consent
• To comply with legal obligations
• To protect our rights, privacy, safety, or property
• With service providers who assist in operating our platform (payment processors, hosting providers)
• In connection with a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to:

• Maintain your session and preferences
• Analyze traffic and usage patterns
• Remember your language preferences
• Provide a personalized experience

You can control cookies through your browser settings, but disabling them may affect the functionality of our services.

rights.title: Your Rights
rights.content:
You have the right to:

• Access and receive a copy of your personal data
• Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
• Request deletion of your personal data
• Object to processing of your personal data
• Withdraw consent at any time
• Export your data in a portable format

To exercise these rights, please contact us at privacy@wisequery.app.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our services are not intended for children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us immediately.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content:
If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at:

WiseQuery
Email: privacy@wisequery.app
General Inquiries: info@wisequery.app

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.intro: Welcome to WiseQuery. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your access to and use of WiseQuery's AI-powered knowledge management platform. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, do not use our services.
terms.questions: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us.

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By creating an account or using WiseQuery, you confirm that you are at least 18 years old (or the legal age of majority in your jurisdiction) and have the legal capacity to enter into these Terms. If you are using WiseQuery on behalf of an organization, you represent that you have the authority to bind that organization to these Terms.

description.title: Description of Services
description.content:
WiseQuery provides an AI-powered knowledge management platform that allows users to:

• Create and organize conversations within project hierarchies
• Interact with AI assistants for information retrieval and analysis
• Use semantic search powered by RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) technology
• Store and manage knowledge across multiple projects

We reserve the right to modify, suspend, or discontinue any part of our services at any time with reasonable notice.

accounts.title: User Accounts
accounts.content:
You are responsible for:

• Providing accurate and complete registration information
• Maintaining the security of your account credentials
• All activities that occur under your account
• Notifying us immediately of any unauthorized access

We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts that violate these Terms or engage in fraudulent activities.

usage.title: Acceptable Use
usage.content:
You agree not to:

• Use our services for any illegal purpose
• Attempt to gain unauthorized access to our systems
• Interfere with or disrupt our services or servers
• Upload malicious code, viruses, or harmful content
• Harass, abuse, or threaten other users
• Use our services to generate spam or misleading content
• Reverse engineer or decompile our software
• Resell or redistribute our services without authorization
• Violate any applicable laws or regulations

content.title: User Content
content.content:
You retain ownership of the content you create and upload to WiseQuery. By using our services, you grant us a limited license to:

• Store, process, and display your content to provide our services
• Create embeddings and indexes for search functionality
• Use anonymized data to improve our AI models and services

You are solely responsible for the content you upload and must ensure it does not violate any laws or third-party rights.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content:
All rights, title, and interest in WiseQuery, including our software, design, logos, and content, are owned by WiseQuery and protected by intellectual property laws. You may not use our trademarks, logos, or brand elements without prior written consent.

The AI responses generated by our platform are provided for informational purposes only and should not be considered professional advice.

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content:
For paid subscription plans:

• Subscription fees are billed in advance on a monthly basis
• All payments are processed through Stripe, our secure payment provider
• You authorize us to charge your payment method for recurring fees
• Prices may change with 30 days notice
• No refunds are provided for partial months of service
• You may cancel your subscription at any time through your account settings

termination.title: Termination
termination.content:
You may terminate your account at any time by contacting us or through your account settings. We may terminate or suspend your access to our services immediately, without prior notice, if:

• You violate these Terms
• Your account is used for fraudulent activities
• We are required to do so by law
• We discontinue the service

Upon termination, your right to use our services will immediately cease, and we may delete your data after a reasonable retention period.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
disclaimer.content:
OUR SERVICES ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EITHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT:

• Our services will be uninterrupted or error-free
• AI responses will be accurate, complete, or reliable
• Our services will meet your specific requirements
• Any defects will be corrected

You use our services at your own risk.

limitation.title: Limitation of Liability
limitation.content:
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WISEQUERY SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR ANY INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:

• Loss of profits, data, or business opportunities
• Damages arising from reliance on AI-generated content
• Service interruptions or data breaches

Our total liability shall not exceed the amount you paid us in the twelve months preceding the claim.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with applicable laws, without regard to conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from these Terms or our services shall be resolved through binding arbitration, except where prohibited by law.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. We will notify you of material changes by posting the updated Terms on our website and updating the "Last Updated" date. Your continued use of our services after such changes constitutes acceptance of the new Terms.

security.title: Security
security.subtitle: Your data security is our top priority. Learn about the measures we take to protect your information.
security.intro: At WiseQuery, we implement industry-leading security practices to protect your data and ensure the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of our services. Our security framework is designed to meet the highest standards expected of AI and cloud-based platforms.

encryption.title: Data Encryption
encryption.description: All data is encrypted in transit using TLS 1.3 and at rest using AES-256 encryption.

infrastructure.title: Secure Infrastructure
infrastructure.description: Our services are hosted on enterprise-grade cloud infrastructure with SOC 2 compliance.

access.title: Access Control
access.description: Role-based access control and multi-factor authentication protect account access.

monitoring.title: 24/7 Monitoring
monitoring.description: Continuous security monitoring and automated threat detection systems.

incident.title: Incident Response
incident.description: Dedicated security team with rapid incident response procedures.

updates.title: Regular Updates
updates.description: Continuous security patches and vulnerability assessments.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content:
We implement comprehensive data protection measures:

• Encryption: All data is encrypted using industry-standard AES-256 encryption at rest and TLS 1.3 for data in transit.

• Isolation: Each user's data is logically isolated to prevent unauthorized access between accounts.

• Backups: Regular encrypted backups are maintained with secure offsite storage.

• Data Minimization: We only collect and retain data necessary to provide our services.

authentication.title: Authentication & Authorization
authentication.content:
We employ robust authentication mechanisms:

• Secure Password Storage: Passwords are hashed using bcrypt with appropriate salt rounds.

• OAuth Integration: Secure OAuth 2.0 integration with major providers (Google, Kakao, Naver).

• Session Management: Secure session handling with automatic expiration and invalidation.

• Access Controls: Fine-grained permissions ensure users can only access their own data.

aiSecurity.title: AI & Data Processing Security
aiSecurity.content:
Special considerations for AI-powered features:

• Prompt Sanitization: Input validation and sanitization prevent injection attacks.

• Embedding Isolation: Vector embeddings are stored with user-level access controls.

• API Security: All OpenAI API communications use secure, authenticated connections.

• Content Filtering: Automated systems detect and prevent misuse of AI features.

compliance.title: Compliance & Standards
compliance.content:
We align with industry security standards and best practices:

• OWASP Guidelines: Development follows OWASP security best practices.

• Regular Audits: Periodic security assessments and code reviews.

• Secure Development: Security-focused software development lifecycle.

• Vendor Security: Third-party services are vetted for security compliance.

vulnerability.title: Vulnerability Disclosure
vulnerability.content:
We welcome responsible disclosure of security vulnerabilities:

• Please report security issues to security@wisequery.app

• Include detailed steps to reproduce the vulnerability

• Allow reasonable time for us to address the issue before public disclosure

• Do not access or modify other users' data during research

We appreciate the security research community's help in keeping WiseQuery safe.

report.title: Report a Vulnerability
report.description: Found a security issue? We appreciate responsible disclosure.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.subtitle: Autonomy for all. Choose the best plan for you.

pro.name: Pro
pro.description: Everything you need for serious work.

googleDrive.syncReminder: Remember to click 'Sync & Close' to save your changes back to WiseQuery.
